# The `SingleLLVMInstructionImpl` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instructions that contain a single LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> can inherit from this. <a href="#details">More...</a>

class llvm::sandboxir::SingleLLVMInstructionImpl&lt;LLVMT&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instructions that contain a single LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> can inherit from this.

### getOperandUseInternal() {#a3d8c19c1e898f835f2a3f546165351ad}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename LLVMT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>Use llvm::sandboxir::SingleLLVMInstructionImpl&lt; LLVMT &gt;::getOperandUseInternal (unsigned OpIdx, bool Verify) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
\\Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> for the <code>OpIdx&#39;th</code> operand.

This is virtual to allow instructions to deviate from the LLVM IR operands, which is a requirement for sandboxir Instructions that consist of more than one LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h/#l00390">390</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/instruction-h">Instruction.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
